channel.title: Server Action on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Action on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: new new new
item.description: so awhile ago I ordered some new servers.. and here they are.. weee the biggin, the littlin and the stupid ass dell to regular $400 rack converter. These will be fun. The biggin is a dual xeon 2 ghz with 1g of ram and dual 36g scsi drives. That should handle the load. ;) the littlin is just a tiny 850mhz celeron.. which is gunna be my dope firewall. and then the stupid racks are dumb.
